nws.name: Overnight
nws.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy. Low around 19, with temperatures rising to around 21 overnight. North northeast wind around 2 mph.

nws.name: Friday
nws.detailedForecast: A chance of snow between 9am and 2pm, then a chance of sleet and a chance of freezing drizzle between 2pm and 5pm, then a chance of snow. Cloudy, with a high near 33. East southeast wind 3 to 15 mph, with gusts as high as 21 mph. Chance of precipitation is 40%. Little or no ice accumulation expected.

nws.name: Friday Night
nws.detailedForecast: A chance of sleet and a chance of freezing drizzle before 7pm, then a chance of snow and a slight chance of sleet and a slight chance of freezing rain between 7pm and 9pm, then a chance of sleet and a chance of freezing drizzle between 9pm and 10pm, then freezing drizzle likely and a chance of sleet between 10pm and midnight, then snow and a slight chance of sleet and a slight chance of freezing rain. Cloudy. Low around 27, with temperatures rising to around 31 overnight. East southeast wind around 14 mph. Chance of precipitation is 90%. New snow accumulation of around one inch possible. Little or no ice accumulation expected.

nws.name: Saturday
nws.detailedForecast: Snow before 10am, then snow and patchy blowing snow. Cloudy, with a high near 31. North northeast wind 10 to 22 mph, with gusts as high as 29 mph. Chance of precipitation is 90%. New snow accumulation of 3 to 5 inches possible.

nws.name: Saturday Night
nws.detailedForecast: Patchy blowing snow and a slight chance of snow before 1am. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 13. North northwest wind 15 to 20 mph, with gusts as high as 28 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%. New snow accumulation of less than half an inch possible.

nws.name: Sunday
nws.detailedForecast: Partly sunny, with a high near 21. North northwest wind 7 to 14 mph.

nws.name: Sunday Night
nws.detailedForecast: Mostly cloudy, with a low around 10. Northeast wind 2 to 6 mph.

nws.name: Monday
nws.shortForecast: Slight Chance Light Snow then Mostly Cloudy
nws.detailedForecast: A slight chance of snow before noon. Mostly cloudy, with a high near 22. South southeast wind 5 to 9 mph.

nws.name: Monday Night
nws.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 11. South wind around 7 mph.

nws.name: Tuesday
nws.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny, with a high near 29. South southwest wind 7 to 10 mph.

nws.name: Tuesday Night
nws.detailedForecast: Mostly cloudy, with a low around 19. South wind around 8 mph.

nws.name: Wednesday
nws.detailedForecast: Mostly cloudy, with a high near 32. West northwest wind around 10 mph, with gusts as high as 16 mph.

nws.name: Wednesday Night
nws.detailedForecast: Mostly cloudy, with a low around 13. North northwest wind around 9 mph.
